name: Survive In The Moon
description:
Survive In The Moon is a First-Person and 3D Shooter SinglePlayer Survival game. The player needs to survive and save the ship on the moon from some creatures. The creatures are living on the moon and trying to attack the ship.

Controls

WASD = Move

1 and 2 = Change Guns

R = Reload

SPACE = Jump

TAB =PauseMenu

important Note

This game is in development so pls guys Give it a try and tell what features are needed to be added
